channel.title: Softlayer_container_billing_invoice_email on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in Softlayer_container_billing_invoice_email on SoftLayer API

item.title: SoftLayer_Container_Billing_Invoice_Email
item.description: SoftLayer_Container_Billing_Invoice_Email Datatype Description This container is used to provide all the options for [[SoftLayer_Billing_Invoice/emailInvoices|emailInvoices]] in order to have the necessary invoices generated and links sent to the user’s email. Local excelInvoiceIds Excel Invoices to email Type: array of integers pdfDetailedInvoiceIds PDF Invoice Details to email Type: array of integers pdfInvoiceIds PDF Invoices to email Type: array of integers
